channel.title: Looking For 2nd Programmer (I have VPS) For Project
channel.description:
I'm looking for a 2nd programmer for a project.
I've got a vps.
I want to clean up a source/client I have, which I've already begun on. There are a few players on it off and on to help find bugs etc too.
I do have funds for a webhost, domain and a vps monthly, but I want to fix it up before I throw a site up for it. But again, there are people playing it off and on so that helps with testing some stuff etc.
I do plan to host this rsps to the public after it is fixed up more, as I've a fairly large quantity of friends waiting to play it who will advertise too once released for the public.
This base is NOT PI.
If you're interested and/or would like more information, please contact me.
My Skype is SlyAsMich. Or you can reply to this thread or inbox me.
Thanks, Mich_

item.title: Looking For 2nd Programmer (I have VPS) For Project
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Look at this thread and then create a new thread in that section. Just a tip if you want more people to be attracted to your project.

Read full topic
